response.summary:
Ingeniero Civil de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Actualmente me desempeño como coordinador de proyectos claves en Hilti Colombia en el sector de sistemas de transporte masivo ferroviarios  , engranando diferentes equipos de consultoría técnica e ingeniería, ventas y servicios en los proyectos claves de la organización.

Civil Engineer from the National University of Colombia. I am currently working as a key project coordinator at Hilti Colombia in the area of metro projects, engaging different teams of technical consulting and engineering, sales and services for the organization's key projects.
response.skills: Ventas, Ingeniería, Trabajo en equipo, Trabajo de campo, Gestión de ventas, Solution Selling, Planificación estratégica, Capacidad de análisis, Investigación, Revit, JavaScript, AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Trabajo en Equipo, Servicio de atención al cliente, Liderazgo, Gestión, Negociación, Español

company.name: Hilti Group
company.description:
"We passionately create enthusiastic customers and build a better future"​.​

Hilti stands for quality, innovation, and direct customer relationships. Some 32,000 employees around the world, in more than 120 countries, contribute to making work on construction sites simpler, faster, and safer while inspiring customers every single day. With products, system solutions, software, and services that provide clear added value. 

We are proud to have ranked #8 among the 2022 World’s Best Workplaces and #4 among the 2022 Best Workplaces in Europe by the Great Place to Work® Institute. These awards are a testament to our investment in our people and culture. 

Our commitment to innovation and customer excellence is matched only by our passion for growing and nurturing high-performing people.

Hilti is Where Your Best Belongs

For unique and diverse career opportunities, take a look at our worldwide vacancies at https://careers.hilti.group/en/jobs/.
